comment: Facebook intentionally releases identityof million conservatives. On Friday, September , Facebook said that an attack on its computer network made the personal information of nearly million users vulnerable. With personal information, criminals can sell it on the dark web, takeover or open new accounts, file fake tax returns and more.

On Friday, September , Facebook said that an attack on its computer network made the personal information of nearly million users vulnerable. With personal information, criminals can sell it on the dark web, takeover or open new accounts, file fake tax returns and more.

      :snt1 (r / release-01
            :ARG0 (p / publication
                  :name (n / name

            :ARG1 (ii / identity

            :ARG1-of (ii2 / intend-01))
      :snt2 (s / say-01

                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "Facebook"))
            :ARG1 (m2 / make-02
                  :ARG0 (a / attack-01

                              :mod (c3 / computer)
                              :poss c2))
                  :ARG1 (v / vulnerable-01
                        :ARG1 (ii3 / information
                              :ARG1-of (p3 / personal-02)
                              :poss (p4 / person
                                    :ARG0-of (u / use-01)
                                    :quant (n4 / nearly
                                          :op1 1000000)))))
            :time (d / date-entity
                  :month 9
                  :weekday (f / friday)))
      :snt3 (p5 / possible-01
            :ARG1 (o / or
                  :op1 (s2 / sell-01
                        :ARG0 (p6 / person
                              :ARG2-of (c4 / criminal-03))
                        :ARG1 (ii4 / information
                              :ARG1-of (p7 / personal-02))
                        :location (w / web
                              :mod (d2 / dark)))
                  :op2 o
                  :op1 (t / take-over-12
                        :ARG0 p6
                        :ARG1 (a2 / account
                              :ARG1-of (n5 / new-01)))
                  :op2 (o2 / open-01
                        :ARG0 p6
                        :ARG1 a2)
                  :op3 (f2 / file-01
                        :ARG0 p6
                        :ARG1 (r2 / return-06
                              :ARG1 (t2 / tax)
                              :ARG1-of (f3 / fake-02)))
                  :op4 (m3 / more)))
      :instrument ii4)
